array.name: richard_clue1
array.item:
You are walking through the campus when nearby students’ chatter catches your ears.

"I’m so bad at Mathematical Analysis, I think I’m gonna fail. But Richard’s classes are so boring..."

"[Professor Richard]? From what I’ve heard there is more than one way to get good grades from here. You should meet him in his office hours, take your wallet."

Intriguing, but could there be truth to those rumours?

array.name: richard_clue2
array.item:
A handwritten note by Catherina:

"I don’t understand how you get people to still pay for your services,
don’t they understand how blackmail works?

No matter, I do.

I also know how to prove what you’re doing."

Who was this meant to?
Blackmail material from victim to suspect.

array.name: richard_clue3
array.item:
You may not be the best student there ever was. But even so, it wouldnt take that much to notice that these exams are pretty bad.
Some of the questions are not even answered, but they are still highly graded.
Strange.
Who is the lecturer responsible for [suspect 2 subject] again?

array.name: richard_clue4
array.item: The logs from the computer room show that Catherina logged into her account late on the night of the murder.\nYou found no further indications of that, but would it be possible that the murder took place on the computer room?
